title: Dual monitors?
body: So I have two monitors set up, and I'm wondering if there is a way to run league of legends on my main monitor, and then on my second monitor be able to switch songs on Spotify or look something up while I'm in game? Without leaving the league tab

replies.body: I'd recommend switching to borderless.  The mouse is still needed to pan around the map in-game, so you'd still have to Alt+Tab to select your songs.  With borderless, though, you won't have to task out, minimize, or 'pause' the game.  I hope that helps!
